description: It is a medium-sized module that increases storage capacity separately from the storage device. This module alone increases the storage capacity by 150 kJ, but you can not use the same thing more than once.

It is a medium-sized module that increases storage capacity separately from the storage device. Although this module alone increases storage capacity by 400 kJ, the same thing can not be used more than once.
